name: Fighter
desc: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor
coolFeatures: A bunch of attacks in one turn
Martial Archetypes include: Arcane Archer, Battle Master, Cavalier, Champion, Eldritch Knight, Purple Dragon Knight, and Samurai
prompts: What led you to become a warrior?
Did you teach yourself or were you taught by a mentor or army?
Did you server in the Last War as a soldier or mercenary?
What marial archetype do you practice?
Why do you fight? For glory, gold, or a higher cause?
